a tool for converting among citation formats.

## Installation

```{r eval=FALSE}
devtools::install_github("ropensci/handlr")
```

```{r}
library("handlr")
```

## the client

```{r}
z <- system.file('extdata/citeproc.json', package = "handlr")
(x <- HandlrClient$new(x = z, from ="citeproc"))
x$path
x$read()
x$parsed
x$write("bibtex")
```
